Summary: Infile directory(s), comma sep (Mandatory: Supply whole path,)
The pipeline custom script in directory (Mandatory: Supply whole path)
The project ID;Also used to allocate core hours in SLURM (Mandatory)
The data files output directory (Mandatory: Supply whole path)
The script files (.sh) output directory (Mandatory: Supply whole path)
Group id of samples to be compared (Ex: 1 for IDN 1-1-1A)
Pedigree file in PLINK format (Supply whole path)
Fasta file for the human genome reference
Setting which aligner was used for alignment in previous analysis
Type of analysis to perform (Valid entries: "genomes", "exomes", "rapid")
The maximum number of cores per node used in the analysis
